titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

body.ab:
1938 CULLEY Mr. Erie
6 rue Royer Collard 7 Impasse du Rouet Paris XIVe
1m 1v a 25 deposit 50v
Oct 20 Miss Lonelyhearts Oct 21 Oct 21 Critic of Pall Mall Oct 22 Oct 22 Comedies of Shakespeare Oct 24 24 Evelina Oct 27 27 Ulysses Oct 28 28 Works of Poe Oct 29 29 Cook's Wedding Nov 2 Nov 2 Assorted Articles Nov 3 Nov 3 Portraits in Miniature Nov 4 Nov 4 Comedies of Congreve I Nov 5 Nov 5 Comedies of Congreve Nov 8 8 Idiot Dec 6 renewed Dec 13 sub ren. Nov 20 - Dec 20 1m1v 25v Dec 13 Gentlemen Prefer Blondes Dec 19 Dec 14 Destructive Element Dec 15 Dec 15 American Ambassadors Dec 19 Dec 19. Howards End Dec 21 21 Years Dec 21 27 Weather in the Streets Dec 31 31 Phoenix Jun 2 Renewed Dec 20 1938 - Jan 20 1939 25v
1939 Jan 2 The Great Abnormals Jan 4 Jan 4 The Works of Sterne (Tristram Shandy) vol I Feb 9 (ren Jan 18) sub. renewed Jan. 20 - Feb. 20 1939 25v
Feb. 9 Psychology of the Unconscious Feb 13 13 Vulgar Errors Feb 11 11 Characters + Commentaries Feb 18 18 Elizabeth + Essex 20 18 Mm. d'Arblay's Life + Letters 1v " 20 20 Clarissa Harlowe 23 23 Laughing Gas 25 25 Mr Norris Changes Trains 27 Renewed Feb 20. March 20 1939 1 v A 25v 27 What Maisie Knew March 6 March 11 Ambassadors vol II March 16 March 16 Golden Bowl vols I-II (no extra charge) Apr 6 Ren Mar 20- April 20th 25v Apr 6 Burmese days April 11 April 11 Pointed Roofs Apr 14 14 Backwater Apr 18 18 Honey Comb Apr 20 20 tunnel April 24 Ren Apr 20 - May 20 1m 1va 25v April 24 Interim April 25 25 Deadlock April 27 27 Revolving Lights May 1 29 Trap May 1 May 1 Oberland May 2 2 Dawns Left Hand May 4 4 Clear Horizons May 6
1939 May 6 Pilgrimage 2v pd. May 8 8 Journals of A. Bennett May 10 10 Bottom Dogs May 12 12 Portrait of an Artist May 15 15 Dubliners May 16 16 To the Lighthouse May 19 19 Big Money May 22 sub ren 1m 1va May 20 - June 20th 25v May 22 Moll Flanders May 25 25 Nightwood May 30 30 Mrs. Dalloway June 3 1st series June 3 Essays Emerson's Essays June 10 3 Death of the Heart 2 f pd. June 5 5 Manhattan Transfer June 8 8 Emerson's Essays 2nd series June 10 10 Eternal Moment june 12 12 Rainbow. June 14 14 Common Reader (Second Series) June 16 16 Small House at Allington june 20
Renewed Aug 31 - Sept 30 1939 1 v 20 for the present no deposit
Aug 31 Donne's Poems. Everyman ed. Sept 1 wrote Sept 1st enclosing m.o. 20v saying was closing and to leave book with concierge after 6.30
Mr Culley returned Donne's poems SB owes his subsc as not used wrote Sept 11 p.c. saying he could get 20v from the concierge (never came to claim his money)
